pkgmetadata.longdescription: Convenient Tool for Solving the Prize-Collecting Steiner Tree Problem // The Prize-Collecting Steiner Tree problem asks to find a subgraph connecting a given set of vertices with the most expensive nodes and least expensive edges. Since it is proven to be NP-hard, exact and efficient algorithm does not exist. This package provides convenient functionality for obtaining an approximate solution to this problem using loopy belief propagation algorithm.
